description: Do a little dance for this fun little clip
name: Hello Nyan Kitty

scenes.context: It's a hello kitty/nyan cat mash up!
scenes.script: Bust out your best dance moves!

share_message: Dance like its super happy fun time!

description: It's all about that bass
name: The Bass

scenes.context: You're doing backup vocals for the clip
scenes.script: You're doing backup vocals for the clip

scenes.context: Show off your badonkadonk!
scenes.script: Show everyone who's really got bass

share_message: Check out my Bass, no treble

description: You are a character in Street Fighter
name: Street Fighter

scenes.context: Strike a pose for the character selection screen
You are about to face off in battle, try to stand so you face your enemy to the right
scenes.script: Engage in battle!!!Dragon or Tiger style?

scenes.context: Celebrate your victory!

description: You record the message, we'll hologram it
name: Hologramming

scenes.context: Hologram yourself!
scenes.script: Send out an important message, as if an evil empire was chasing you

description: It's a nice day for a roller coaster ride
name: Roller

scenes.context: You are riding on a rolle coaster ride
scenes.script: Are you a screamer or a day dreamer?

scenes.context: Make a face for the camera!
scenes.script: It's time for a snap shot from your day in the park

share_message: Check out my roller coaster face

description: Stand up for the national anthem!
name: World Cup Argentina

scenes.context: Keep steady and try to stand at the same angle as the other players
You made the starting eleven!

description: You are replacing Alejandro Sabella as head coach
name: Argentina Coach

scenes.context: This looks like a promising attack
scenes.script: You can sense the goal coming

scenes.context: Show your feelings with the quality of that attempt
Goaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaallllll
scenes.script: It was all due to your coaching!

description: Getting ready to race
name: F1 Rookie

scenes.context: Getting ready to race
The race is on!
You won the race!

share_message: There's a new driver in town

description: You are replacing Neymar at the last minute....
name: World Cup Brazil

scenes.context: The announcer seems skeptical if this line up change...
scenes.script: It's your time to shine for Brazil!

share_message: It's your time to shine for Brazil!

description: Defend your city!
name: Superior Man

scenes.context: You've spotted a burglary with your superior vision!
scenes.script: You're on the look out for crime, and you spot something

scenes.context: You are on the chase
scenes.script: Nodbody can run faster than you!

scenes.context: Take down the bandit!(remember to be with your back to the camera)!
You gotta fly, more crime awaits justice!
scenes.script: Take off to the next adventure

description: Jump from an airplane! Be part of Dive School!
name: Dive School

scenes.context: You are preparing for the jump inside the plane, you should be excited/shocked
You are free-falling from 12,000 feet!!!

description: Prepare to Turbo Ski!
name: TurboSki

scenes.context: Get your ski on!
Faster! Fasssster!
Watch out for that tree!

share_message: Check out my mad ski moves

description: This is your chance to win the Oscars!
name: The Oscars

scenes.context: You are sitting on a chair - all the nominees are waiting for the announcement - and you are the winner!!!
You are on the stage! Say a joke
Say thanks to the people who got you to this point

You are loosing your grip
You are falling down the space ship

description: Defeat the giant monster!

scenes.script: Report to base as your nearing the hot zone

description: Aliens have invaded earth!
name: Aliens

scenes.context: You are a WWN field reporter, and spaceships have invaded earth
As President, reassure your people at this dark hour
Your live report is suddenly interrupted
scenes.script: give your final report from the field

description: Soap up your daily beefs!
name: The Dumb & The Helpless

scenes.context: Tell your partner whats really bothering you...
Defned your self against these vile accusations
scenes.script: You are an angle! Remind them!

scenes.context: Stick to your guns!
scenes.script: Are you going to let them off so easy?

scenes.context: Have the last say
scenes.script: The final word is yours, a joke perhaps?

share_message: These are the days of my life

description: Share your thoughts on current events
name: Hot Topic

scenes.context: Share your thoughts on current events
scenes.script: What topic do you think is hot this week?

description: As The Interpreter interpret President Obama's speech to sign language
name: The Interpreter

scenes.context: They aint cheering for you, but you might as well enjoy it
scenes.script: This is your 15 minutes, bask in the moment

scenes.context: Show off your own sign language
scenes.script: How would YOU say Triumph in sign language?

scenes.context: Obama keeps talking, you keep making up signs
scenes.script: A boy raised herding cattle... thats a tough one

share_message: Anyone can be a sign language interpreter
